channel.title: Ode to the Undead Champion
channel.description:
**-Ode to the Undead Champion** Darkness stretches, three sleepless nights Whipping winds, tame funeral lights A new world, where might makes right Glorious gardens given to blight Down, not out, the Blue Dragon fight A call to arms, all of their might Deathly fields, the candle grows bright Undead defender words incite Salvation sewn, through ghastly sight A Castle saved by the Death Knight
Not my Deathnote, but my inspiration
![5XLilwC|389x500](upload://l0U0qVP6co6OcBeStaXANyOngft.png)

item.title: Ode to the Undead Champion
item.dc:creator: Thunder
item.description:
-Ode to the Undead Champion
Darkness stretches, three sleepless nights
Whipping winds, tame funeral lights
A new world, where might makes right
Glorious gardens given to blight
Down, not out, the Blue Dragon fight
A call to arms, all of their might
Deathly fields, the candle grows bright
Undead defender words incite
Salvation sewn, through ghastly sight
A Castle saved by the Death Knight

Not my Deathnote, but my inspiration

Read full topic
